schema.description:
集成产品类型：

- CLOUD_MONITOR：云监控
- LOG_SERVICE：日志服务

告警事件是否自动恢复：

- true（默认）
- false
告警事件自动恢复时间，默认时间为300秒。

告警集成是否启用：

- true
- false
最近1小时总数及异常数。

事件映射，将源字段映射到目标字段。
固定字段映射，创建集成时默认生成的固定映射。更多信息，请参见下方补充说明。
schema.example:
[
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"alertname",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警名称",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.alertName",
        "id":10001,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"MAP",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"severity",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[
            {
                "mappingValue":"critical",
                "mappingName":"P1",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"CRITICAL"
            },
            {
                "mappingValue":"error",
                "mappingName":"P2",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"WARN"
            },
            {
                "mappingValue":"warning",
                "mappingName":"P3",
                "mappingType":"MAP",
                "originValue":"INFO"
            }
        ],
        "name":"告警等级",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.triggerLevel",
        "id":10002,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"message",
        "expression":"{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。",
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警描述",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":null,
        "id":10003,
        "fieldType":"ANNOTATION"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"value",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"告警样本值",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"$.curValue",
        "id":10004,
        "fieldType":"ANNOTATION"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"EXTRACT",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"source",
        "expression":null,
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"来源",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":null,
        "id":10007,
        "fieldType":"LABEL"
    },
    {
        "redefineType":"ADD",
        "matchExpression":null,
        "fieldName":"generatorUrl",
        "expression":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
        "mappingRuleList":[

        ],
        "name":"事件地址",
        "integrationId":1234,
        "jsonPath":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}",
        "id":10012,
        "fieldType":"GENERATE_URL"
    }
]

schema.description: 事件映射，将源字段映射到目标字段，拓展字段增加映射。更多信息，请参见下方补充说明。

告警事件恢复字段。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。

> 仅日志服务支持设置此参数。

告警事件恢复字段值。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。
> 仅日志服务支持设置此参数。

IntegrationProductType.description:
集成产品类型：

- CLOUD_MONITOR：云监控
- LOG_SERVICE：日志服务

AutoRecover.description:
告警事件是否自动恢复：

- true（默认）
- false

RecoverTime.description: 告警事件自动恢复时间，默认时间为300秒。

State.description:
告警集成是否启用：

- true
- false

Stat.description: 最近1小时总数及异常数。

items.description: 最近1小时总数及异常数。

items.description: 事件映射，将源字段映射到目标字段，拓展字段增加映射。

InitiativeRecoverField.description:
告警事件恢复字段。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。
> 仅日志服务支持此参数。

InitiativeRecoverValue.description:
告警事件恢复字段值。系统收到恢复事件后会根据恢复事件中的字段查询告警事件进行恢复。
> 仅日志服务支持此参数。

    <RequestId>34ED024E-9E31-434A-9E4E-D9D15C3****</RequestId>
    <Integration>
        <IntegrationId>1234</IntegrationId>
        <IntegrationName>云监控集成</IntegrationName>
        <IntegrationProductType>CLOUD_MONITOR</IntegrationProductType>
        <Description>测试</Description>
        <ApiEndpoint>https://alerts.aliyuncs.com/api/v1/integrations/custom/ymQBN******</ApiEndpoint>
        <ShortToken>ymQBN******</ShortToken>
        <AutoRecover>true</AutoRecover>
        <RecoverTime>300</RecoverTime>
        <DuplicateKey>LABEL.dimensions::LABEL.ruleId</DuplicateKey>
        <State>true</State>
        <Liveness>ready</Liveness>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>alertname</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>告警名称</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>$.alertName</jsonPath>
            <id>10001</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>MAP</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>severity</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <mappingRuleList>
                <mappingValue>critical</mappingValue>
                <mappingName>P1</mappingName>
                <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                <originValue>CRITICAL</originValue>
            </mappingRuleList>
            <mappingRuleList>
                <mappingValue>error</mappingValue>
                <mappingName>P2</mappingName>
                <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                <originValue>WARN</originValue>
            </mappingRuleList>
            <mappingRuleList>
                <mappingValue>warning</mappingValue>
                <mappingName>P3</mappingName>
                <mappingType>MAP</mappingType>
                <originValue>INFO</originValue>
            </mappingRuleList>
            <name>告警等级</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>$.triggerLevel</jsonPath>
            <id>10002</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>message</fieldName>
            <expression>{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。</expression>
            <name>告警描述</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10003</id>
            <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>value</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>告警样本值</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>$.curValue</jsonPath>
            <id>10004</id>
            <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>imageUrl</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>告警图片</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10005</id>
            <fieldType>ANNOTATION</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>check</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>检查项</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10006</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>source</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>来源</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10007</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>class</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>分类</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10008</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>service</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>服务</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10009</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>startat</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>开始时间</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10010</id>
            <fieldType>START_AT</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>endat</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>结束时间</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath/>
            <id>10011</id>
            <fieldType>END_AT</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <FieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>ADD</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>generatorUrl</fieldName>
            <expression>https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}</expression>
            <name>事件地址</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}</jsonPath>
            <id>10012</id>
            <fieldType>GENERATE_URL</fieldType>
        </FieldRedefineRules>
        <ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>dimensions</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>dimensions</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>$.dimensions</jsonPath>
            <id>10013</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
        <ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
            <redefineType>EXTRACT</redefineType>
            <matchExpression/>
            <fieldName>expression</fieldName>
            <expression/>
            <name>expression</name>
            <integrationId>1234</integrationId>
            <jsonPath>$.expression</jsonPath>
            <id>10014</id>
            <fieldType>LABEL</fieldType>
        </ExtendedFieldRedefineRules>
    </Integration>
</UpdateIntegrationResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 修改集成相关信息
requestParamsDescription:
### FieldRedefineRules和ExtendedFieldRedefineRules参数说明 完整示例如下： ``` [ { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"alertname", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"告警名称", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":"$.alertName", "id":10001, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"MAP", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"severity", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ { "mappingValue":"critical", "mappingName":"P1", "mappingType":"MAP", "originValue":"CRITICAL" }, { "mappingValue":"error", "mappingName":"P2", "mappingType":"MAP", "originValue":"WARN" }, { "mappingValue":"warning", "mappingName":"P3", "mappingType":"MAP", "originValue":"INFO" } ], "name":"告警等级", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":"$.triggerLevel", "id":10002, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"message", "expression":"{{$labels.namespace}} / {{$labels.dimensions}} 发生 {{ $labels.alertname }}, 当前值 {{$value}}。", "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"告警描述", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10003, "fieldType":"ANNOTATION" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"value", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"告警样本值", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":"$.curValue", "id":10004, "fieldType":"ANNOTATION" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"imageUrl", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"告警图片", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10005, "fieldType":"ANNOTATION" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"check", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"检查项", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10006, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"source", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"来源", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10007, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"class", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"分类", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10008, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"service", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"服务", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10009, "fieldType":"LABEL" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"startat", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"开始时间", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10010, "fieldType":"START_AT" }, { "redefineType":"EXTRACT", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"endat", "expression":null, "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"结束时间", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":null, "id":10011, "fieldType":"END_AT" }, { "redefineType":"ADD", "matchExpression":null, "fieldName":"generatorUrl", "expression":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}", "mappingRuleList":[ ], "name":"事件地址", "integrationId":1234, "jsonPath":"https://cloudmonitor.console.aliyun.com/index.htm#/alarmInfo/name={{$labels.ruleId}}&searchValue=&searchType=name&searchProduct=/history/all/searchKey:{{$labels.ruleId}},startTime:{{sub $startsAt 300000}},endTime:{{$endsAt}}", "id":10012, "fieldType":"GENERATE_URL" } ] ``` 字段说明： |字段|说明| |---|---| |RedefineType|- MAP：通过映射表进行字段映射，如告警等级映射。
- EXTRACT：通过jsonPath从JSON中解析一个字段映射到目标字段。
- ADD：添加一个内容映射到目标字段。
- CONDITION：条件映射。当满足条件时，通过jsonPath从JSON中解析一个字段映射到目标字段。
- CONCAT：串联映射。将多个字段以指定的串联符合拼接在一起后映射到模板字段。
| |MatchExpression|- 如果RedefineType设置为CONCAT，MatchExpression的值即为传递串联的分隔符。
- 如果RedefineType设置为CONDITION，MatchExpression的值即为传递条件规则的JSON字符串。| |FieldType|- LABEL：告警元数据，一组标签唯一标识一个事件，标签相同的事件为同一个事件，重复上报会进行合并，常见的标签如 “alertname: 告警名称 ”。
- ANNOTATION：注释是告警事件的附加描述，注释不属于元数据。常见的注释有 “message: 告警内容”。
- GENERATE_URL：事件URL地址。
- START_AT：告警事件开始时间。
- END_AT：告警事件结束时间。| |Expression|条件映射样式，作为转义字符串值存入Expression。| |MappingRuleList|字段重定义规则。| |Name|名称。| |FieldName|字段名称。| |JsonPath|源字段名称。| |IntegrationId|集成ID。| |Id|映射字段存储表主键ID。|
